support.whatsappMessage: Bonjour, j'ai besoin d'aide avec DigiNum

contact.title: Contact Support
contact.description: Need help? Reach out to our support team via WhatsApp.

howToBuy.question: How do I buy a number?
howToBuy.answer: Select your service and country, then choose your preferred payment method.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods are accepted?
paymentMethods.answer: We accept Stripe credit cards and Mobile Money (MTN MoMo, Orange Money).

numberValidity.question: How long is the number valid?
numberValidity.answer: Numbers are typically valid for 24 hours from activation.
